flow.descriptionCdata:
3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.1980012c-ef7c-4b5a-9cb9-c9b576cdd5d6.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.30771a9f-207f-466d-b868-949b47dc12bb.description=This workflow adds/updates the component property using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing property (In this case input "valueType" is not required , This input will not be considered even if provided) no - To add/update property valueType - Value type of the property. It can have value from selection list "CSA-Property-ValueType". This Input is required only when Input "onlyUpdate" is selected as "no". values - One or more values dilimited by comma , (If user want to use some other separator for multiple values then needs to be pass as next input "separator") separator - A delimiter that separates elements in the values ( default dilimiter used is comma ,) 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.3bbbd775-c4e1-40a0-88b7-5e10eee0950e.prompt=User Identifier 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.3e556012-2f4f-4de4-a17b-d2eef3992a27.description=Changes a VM's power state. Must specify either hostSystem, clusterName, or vmResourcePool as a target location for VMs. Input Parameters\: vmName - name of the VM that will be created with this flow templateName - name of the VM template to clone in vCenter osType - linux or windows host - vCenter host to execute against user - vCenter username password - vCenter password vmDatacenter - target Datacenter on the vCenter host for the VMs dataStore - target datastore on the vCenter host for the VMs hostSystem - target ESX host for the VMs clusterName - target cluster for the VMs vmResourcePool - target resource pool for the VMs vmPowerState - the desired power state (on / off etc) Responses\: success - if the command completes execution and its exit code is 0 failure - otherwise Result Fields\: serviceXml - xml representation of the server created in vCenter 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.4391ef75-bd3e-479f-bdae-bb3141e04153.prompt=User Identifier 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.463a40ae-a877-46a0-ab8c-87e48ee73b8c.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.55181557-0fa0-4a36-8972-e1552e65feab.prompt=Process Instance ID 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.645faba1-a92c-4fee-a7a3-b6ddaf77c040.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.68fde465-9cf7-4395-ac70-a8056070761d.prompt=User Identifier 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.6d22950d-1002-403a-95e6-fec9edd7bcfa.prompt=Process Instance ID 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.7b76602b-3cee-440d-bb20-4ea9c233b85d.prompt=Artifact ID 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.7dd79098-57d9-4970-8664-46d5ffdc5144.prompt=User Identifier 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.8c54fa76-c625-490c-8554-76995e665001.prompt=User Identifier 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.96a35f36-ecea-4dff-8d13-36ec061034a6.prompt=Resource Provider ID 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.ce48fece-b6ae-4b2c-a87d-32dcfbfdbb49.prompt=Process Instance ID 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.da02b14a-93b6-480a-9006-81e07407ec2c.prompt=Component ID 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.description=
Suspend the Virtual Machine

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.e5fdc68f-5323-462b-b583-5d97296cf5b6.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.f336351b-4e32-46e4-9783-32fdc088e375.prompt=User Identifier 3cb32ba2-324f-406b-b122-6612647fc020.fd9914ad-231a-43c6-a7a5-3d4369bf2ae6.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State
flow.name: vCenter Suspend Server
